event.title: (German) Versuchsteilnahme – Auszahlung der Zusatzvergütung
event.description:
1. Notification: Participants are informed that they will receive additional compensation for their participation in the experiment.
2. Compensation Increase: The originally promised amount is doubled.
3. Form Requirement: Before disbursement, a two-page form must be completed.
   The information is required to comply with ethical standards for publicly funded studies and is partly due to data protection regulations.
4. Delay: After submitting the form, the additional compensation is disbursed via bank transfer after about 30 days.
   The waiting period is part of the monitoring of disbursement processes to prevent abuse.
5. Information: The experiment leader explains the next steps for disbursement after the experiment.
event.description_en:

2. Compensation Increase: The originally promised amount is doubled.
3. Form Requirement: Before disbursement, a two-page form must be completed.
   The information is required to comply with ethical standards for publicly funded studies and is partly due to data protection regulations.
4. Delay: After submitting the form, the additional compensation is disbursed via bank transfer after about 30 days.
   The waiting period is part of the monitoring of disbursement processes to prevent abuse.
5. Information: The experiment leader explains the next steps for disbursement after the experiment.

event.title: (German) Experimental participation – disbursement of additional compensation (Red Tape)
event.description:
1. Notification: Participants are informed that they will receive additional compensation for their participation in the experiment.
2. Compensation Increase: The originally promised amount is doubled.      
3. Form Requirement: Before disbursement, a two-page form must be completed.
   The form contains repeatedly requested demographic information, seemingly irrelevant information, and very detailed questions.
<Barrier: Administrative Burden>
4. Delay: After submitting the form, the additional compensation is disbursed via bank transfer after about 30 days at the earliest.
<Barrier: Temporal Delay>
5. Information: Further instructions for disbursement are announced after the experiment.
<Cost: Frustration, Uncertainty, Loss of Control>
